configuration.name: Footer Component - Content Tests.renders the About Us section

item.itemvalue: Jest.Footer Component - Content Tests.renders the About Us section

task.summary:
feat: Carousel 1.4.10 Reflow accessibility updates (#258)
* Added guidance for reflow, zoom, and scrolling exceptions in carousel * Linked WCAG 1.4.10 Reflow criteria

Add accessible styling for toggle switch elements
- Introduced new SASS styles for toggle switches, including focus-visible, disabled, and checked states. - Updated example usage in content files for better alignment with accessibility standards.

Refactor toast snackbar behavior and styles
- Updated `openToast` function to include inert and enabled state toggling with a delay. - Added new styles for toast snackbar states (`enabled`, `inert`). - Adjusted example usage in content files to reflect the updated implementation.
fix: update link for test criteria overview

feat: enforce numeric input restrictions in markdown content rendering
- Added `getNumericGuards` utility to block non-numeric entry for inputs with `inputMode="numeric"`. - Integrated numeric guards into rendered `<input>` elements in `markdown-content.tsx`.

refactor: Clean up SCSS and update radio button examples
- Changed _md-styles.scss rgba values to use percents to fix the style lint errors.
- Updated radio button examples to include proper class names and improve styling consistency.
- Adjusted Markdown rendering logic to use `defaultChecked` for radio inputs to prevent React-controlled component issues.
- Introduced new styles for `.cards` to enable grid-based layouts and interactive states for card components.

Enhance star rating hover styles and clean up unused SCSS
- Added hover-specific styles for the star rating component, including theme-aware filled and outlined star icons. - Removed redundant hover opacity styles for `.star-rating label`. - Simplified dark mode filter implementation for better consistency.

refactor: Simplify and enhance input handling in Markdown renderer
- Consolidated `input` element handling logic into a streamlined implementation. - Change input max range to 10
refactor: Update event type in password toggle functions to use React.SyntheticEvent
style: Add custom styles for range slider component and include in Markdown content
refactor: Use SCSS variables for range slider styles and correct aria-valuemax in documentation

MESSAGE.value: feat: ARC-621--update footer and add about page layout adjustments

Feat: how to test native apps page (#275)
* First draft of the how to test native apps page
* Updating screen reader links - both android and iOS
* Updating some headings, character spacing, and line spacing
* Updated screen reader steps, keyboard setps, large text steps, needs more review and re-ordering eventually
* Updating steps to start with SR set up on both devices and BlueTooth KB, as well as large text from internal doc

feat: Carousel 1.4.10 Reflow accessibility updates (#258)
* Added guidance for reflow, zoom, and scrolling exceptions in carousel * Linked WCAG 1.4.10 Reflow criteria
Added input actions in markdown rendering for checkboxes, radios, text and elements that prefer onChange

Add accessible styling for toggle switch elements
- Introduced new SASS styles for toggle switches, including focus-visible, disabled, and checked states. - Updated example usage in content files for better alignment with accessibility standards.

Refactor toast snackbar behavior and styles
- Updated `openToast` function to include inert and enabled state toggling with a delay. - Added new styles for toast snackbar states (`enabled`, `inert`). - Adjusted example usage in content files to reflect the updated implementation.
fix: update link for test criteria overview
fix: remove unused stylelint rule and adjust chip styles for high contrast mode

Refactor markdown event handling and toast snackbar behavior
- Introduced `fnHandler` utility for safe event invocation in Markdown rendering. - Updated `openToast` to simplify inert/enabled state toggling logic. - Added accessible styles and variables for toast snackbar success states. - Updated documentation and examples for enhanced clarity.

feat: improve range slider demo and enhance customization options
- Removed outdated comments and unused code in range slider documentation. - Refined `range-slider.md` demo for better clarity and functionality. - Added custom handling for range inputs in `markdown-content.tsx`. - Expanded markdown function map to support more events. - General code cleanup for consistency and readability.

feat: enforce numeric input restrictions in markdown content rendering
- Added `getNumericGuards` utility to block non-numeric entry for inputs with `inputMode="numeric"`. - Integrated numeric guards into rendered `<input>` elements in `markdown-content.tsx`.

chore: clean up SCSS formatting and update radio button documentation examples
- Changed radio label psuedo boxshadow to transparent to keep it from making a black background in the md examples.
- Uncommented the first few examples

chore: Clean up SCSS formatting and improve radio button example styling
chore: clean up SCSS formatting and update radio button documentation examples
- Changed radio label psuedo boxshadow to transparent to keep it from making a black background in the md examples.
- Uncommented the first few examples
- Introduced new styles for `.cards` grid layout and interactive hover state.
- Updated markdown-content.tsx to accommodate radio inputs as controlled elements.

refactor: Clean up SCSS and update radio button examples
- Changed _md-styles.scss rgba values to use percents to fix the style lint errors.
- Updated radio button examples to include proper class names and improve styling consistency.
- Adjusted Markdown rendering logic to use `defaultChecked` for radio inputs to prevent React-controlled component issues.
- Introduced new styles for `.cards` to enable grid-based layouts and interactive states for card components.

Enhance star rating hover styles and clean up unused SCSS
- Added hover-specific styles for the star rating component, including theme-aware filled and outlined star icons. - Removed redundant hover opacity styles for `.star-rating label`. - Simplified dark mode filter implementation for better consistency.

feat: Add extensive ReactMarkdown element overrides and utilities
- Introduced modular overrides for markdown elements: `a`, `div`, `button`, `li`, `img`, `input`, `video`, `source`. - Enhanced interactivity and accessibility support, including ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and `aria-disabled` handling. - Added `markdownFunctionMap` support for linking user-defined functions to element events (`data-fn`, `data-event`). - Implemented utilities for asset path resolution, link classification (internal vs external), and internal anchor navigation. - Improved code maintainability by abstracting shared logic into helper utilities.

feat: Add reusable helpers and element overrides for Markdown rendering - Introduced modular helpers for link handling, ARIA utilities, and asset resolution to enhance markdown functionality. - Added reusable overrides for Markdown elements (e.g., ``, ``, `
  • `, `

feat: Add reusable Markdown content overrides and helper utilities
- Introduced modular overrides for `li`, `img`, `video`, `source`, `a`, `button`, `input`, and `div` elements to enhance Markdown rendering. - Added helper utilities for event handling, ARIA support, link management, and asset path resolution. - Refactored `MarkdownContent` to use the modular override system, improving reusability and maintainability. - Enhanced accessibility and interactivity for Markdown-rendered content.

refactor: Simplify and enhance input handling in Markdown renderer
- Consolidated `input` element handling logic into a streamlined implementation. - Change input max range to 10
refactor: Update event type in password toggle functions to use React.SyntheticEvent
style: Add custom styles for range slider component and include in Markdown content
refactor: Use SCSS variables for range slider styles and correct aria-valuemax in documentation

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: refactor: Use SCSS variables for range slider styles and correct aria-valuemax in documentation
